oai_dc:dc.dc:title: KonText Web Demo
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Josífko, Michal
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: web service
corpus
parallel corpus
demo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An interactive web demo for querying selected ÚFAL and LINDAT corpora. LINDAT/CLARIN KonText is a fork of ÚČNK KonText (https://github.com/czcorpus/kontext, maintained by Tomáš Machálek) that contains some modifications and additional features. Kontext, in turn, is a fork of the Bonito 2.68 python web interface to the corpus management tool Manatee (http://nlp.fi.muni.cz/trac/noske, created by Pavel Rychlý).
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Charles University, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics (UFAL)
